panels.description: Colour ranges here are specifically for LiFePo. Disable this and use the Battery Voltage (Lead Acid) chart instead if you have a Lead Acid battery.
panels.title: Battery Voltage (LiFePo)

panels.description: Colour ranges here are specifically for Lead Acid. Disable this and use the Battery Voltage (LiFePo) chart instead if you have a LiFePo battery.
